WorkItem.Description:
This could be more of an Apple software issue, but figure out that fixing it here would be easier than waiting for Apple.
 
Text in documents opened in Numbers.app always appear in bold, italic and striketrough style. Number.app disregards val= attributes from strike/i/b elements in styles.xml file.
 
This could be fixed if PHPExcel/Writer/Excel2007/Style.php outputs <strike> <i> and <b> only if the value attribute is 'true'.
